script:
1). Do you prefer chicken or beef?
Yes, how about you?
They're delicious
Chicken please 
2). I don't understand these sales figures.
Sailing is lots of fun.
Let me have a look. 
I'm smarter than you.
3). You'll have the information by Friday, won't you?
I won't have it by Monday.
No, I didn't have it yet.
Yes, I'm sure I will.
